Solidarity of Pusan Voters Campaign Inaugurated
articles.content:
508th Thursday Meeting Held in S. Korea 
    Pyongyang, March 9 (KCNA) -- The 508th Thursday Meeting was reportedly held by the Family Movement for Realizing Democracy in Seoul on Mar. 4.
 The meeting was held without informing police of it as a token of protest against the authorities' retrogressive revision of the "law on assembly and demonstration which limits the freedom of assembly and demonstration and only grants more power to the police".    
 At the end of the meeting the participants staged a demonstration, chanting the slogan "Withdraw the law on assembly and demonstration and the security law," etc. with placard carrying letters "Ensure free assembly and demonstration" in their hands.

articles.title: GNP Hit for Its Misbehavior
Kim Jong Il Lauded
KCNA Urges U.S. to Make Switchover in Its Policy toward DPRK
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Lauded 
    Pyongyang, March 9 (KCNA) -- The Kim Jong Il Club of the Listeners and Friends of Pyongyang Broadcasts in Jordan issued a statement on February 17 congratulating leader Kim Jong Il on his birthday.
 Convinced that his revolutionary idea is the banner of the struggle of the present times and the beacon of independence, all the members of the club had it as a great pride to have the club named after his august name, the statement said, and added:    
 He is well known to the world as the excellent politician who is defending the interests of humankind and creating the new. He is the sun of humankind who is steering the cause of independence in Asia and the rest of the world.
